comment: Im gonna flush and fill the coolant in the Camry this weekend. Also gonna use a turkey baster to remove as much Power Steering fluid out of the overflow tank and refill with fresh fluid, once a week over the next few weekends. Ordering rotors and pads for the front disc brakes, for next weekend. Just ordered new aftermarket headlight assemblies, as well.

Ordering rotors and pads for the front disc brakes, for next weekend. Just ordered new aftermarket headlight assemblies, as well.

            :time (w / weekend

      :snt2 (a2 / and

                  :ARG1 (b / baster
                        :mod (t2 / turkey))

                        :ARG2 (o / out-06

                                    :ARG2-of (o2 / overflow-01))))
                  :mod (a3 / also))
            :op2 (r2 / refill-01

            :frequency (r3 / rate-entity-91

                  :ARG2 (t4 / temporal-quantity

                        :unit (w2 / week)))
            :time (w3 / weekend
                  :mod (n2 / next)))
      :snt3 (o3 / order-02
            :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
            :ARG1 (a4 / and
                  :op1 (r4 / rotor)
                  :op2 (p2 / pad)
                  :purpose (b2 / brake

                        :mod (f6 / front)))
            :time (w4 / weekend

      :mod (j / just)
